intro: Aneilema brunneospermum, commonly known as the brown-seeded aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant features lance-shaped leaves and produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Its fruit is a dry capsule that contains numerous small, brown seeds. Aneilema brunneospermum is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks.
